content.body: Andreu Botella (he/they): I think it's tricky due to the 0x00 bytes surrounding the ASCII bytes

content.body: Domenic: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-shadowrealm/pull/336#issuecomment-994446991 onward is relevant to your interests. Seems like we might not be getting rid of serialize and transfer anytime soon.
